name: Grade Right
answer.1: I - Pitting edemaoedema may present, completely resolve on elevation (during overnight) and normal skin
answer.2: II(early) - Pitting edemaoedema manifests, does not resolve completely  on elevation (overnight). Normal skin
answer.3: II(late) - Late stages of II with non-pitting oedema & thickened skin
answer.4: III - Oedema is not pitting with tropic skin changes: Acanthosis, Fat deposits, Warty over growth

name: Grade Left
answer.1: I - Pitting edemaoedema may present, completely resolve on elevation (during overnight) and normal skin
answer.2: II(early) - Pitting edemaoedema manifests, does not resolve completely  on elevation (overnight). Normal skin
answer.3: II(late) - Late stages of II with non-pitting oedema & thickened skin
